main event: Two objects shaped like derby hats were seen at New Castle AFB on 6 November 1954.
interesting points: The objects had three blue lights on the bottom and were observed three times,They changed spatially during the sighting,The observation lasted for about 3-4 minutes,The investigation suggested they could be a balloon or possibly astronomical phenomena,The report indicated that similar objects may have been two private aircraft.
sighted object: two derby hat-shaped objects with blue lights
